items.title: Scottish government facing legal action over Sturgeon inquiry evidence
items.description: The Scottish Information Commissioner is taking ministers to court after they missed a deadline to release documents.

items.title: Andy Burnham faces decision on bid to return as MP
items.description: Some of Sir Keir Starmer's allies say they will try to stop Burnham from standing in a by-election.

items.title: Driver admits killing teen freed from Dubai jail
items.description: Marcus Fakana, 19, was killed in a car crash shortly after being released from prison in Dubai.

items.title: Harry Styles says new single Aperture is comeback's 'perfect little bow'
items.description: The singer has announced 50 shows across seven cities, including six at London's Wembley Stadium.

items.title: Mandela's prison key, sunglasses and shirt can be sold after daughter wins court battle
items.description: The authorities tried to stop their export arguing they were part of the country's heritage.
